1.0.name: wordpress/mustavatar
1.0.description: Do you ever wish your WordPress site was just a little more manly? Don't you think a nice thick mustache would suit your site? Mustavatar will man-up your site by adding a mustache on any faces it can find in your avatars. Author bios, comments, any place where standard avatars are used will get a lovely thick handlebar 'stache. Man it up with Mustavatar!
